item.title: Start of a Journey
item.description: Today I embark on a new journey of writing down my thoughts and experiences in software development
item.content:encoded:
A new Beginning

For a long time now I have been wanting to start writing my thoughts down on paper. I have a physical notebook where my thoughts and notes are haphazardly written which has this big downside of not being very searchable.

So over the next couple of weeks I will be working on digitizing these notes and thoughts here.

Come join me on this journey of inspiration lost and found.

~ Stephen
